Delete this record? I understand that this record will be permanently removed.
Backup "Your backup location isn't set!! Use the button below to choose one.\nTip: It's a good idea to create a new folder for your backups (e.g., 'Safe Box Backup')." Set Location Backup location is set Backup path is %1$s Backup was last taken on %1$s * Backup file is encrypted by your current master password\n* Backup is taken everytime you login with password Edit Path Please enter your current master password to create a new backup file. It may take a while to backup data. Sit back and relax ! Your backup is complete! It is protected by your current password. Click here to set backup path
Restore "Click below button to select a backup file.\nPlease note that to restore data, you have to enter the same master password that was used to make the backup file." Please enter the password that was used to make the backup file. Error while importing data. Please re-verify file and password. Data has been successfully restored. It may take a while to restore data. Sit back and relax !
Password is incorrect ! Something went wrong! Please try again later.
backup data safebox Safe Box Backup This notification helps you to keep track of backup progress Data Backup "Backing up your data to local storage. You will be notified once it is complete" Backup Failed! Please set backup path Backup is complete. It is a good idea to keep a copy in cloud To ensure you\'re always aware of your automatic backups, please allow notifications.\nYou will be alerted when a backup is complete or if an issue occurs. Need Notification permission
composeapp
Safely store your private data Enter password Enter something ! Too short ! Enter a special character (e.g. @, *, $) Must include at least one uppercase(A) and one lowercase letter(a). Enter at least two numbers (e.g. 1, 2, 3) Save Password unlock Collapse Login Data Bank Account Bank Card Secure Note Enter a hint Show Hint Hide Hint Hint Title URL User Id Notes Bank Account Data Account Number Customer Name Customer Id Branch Code Branch Name Branch Address IFSC Code MICR Code Welcome Back ! Password is OK Welcome ! Set a strong master password Timeout You were away for too long.
